title: Fun,family friendly
text: Very cool and not complicated activity, easygoing. Definitely unique! Unforgettable! Water is comfortable temperature.

title: comfortable ride
text: Everything is good for transportation, comfortable, professional. Traffic is not to bad,service is 4 star.

title: Good choice
text: I am very happy that I decided to travel to Greece. Well worth it! !!Everything like in the movie. Beautyful,historical.
place: Athens Super Saver: Athens Sightseeing Tour plus Delphi Day Trip

title: Саve diving
text: Absolutely beautiful experience, very unique, safe,water is not could, very clear.small fish present.

title: Super!!!
text: Out of this world! !!Absolutely beautiful place! Very romantic, good idea to go there early in the morning less traffic. But unforgettable!

title: Tulum stay.
text: Very safe for family with small children or teens.Rooms are beautiful, food is real,all fresh, good cooks,we had good experience, no problems. Staff well trained, very pleased. It's definitely four and a half star so experience, no nonsense. Night intertainment is good quality, also lots to do for kids.

title: Great travel to Tulum
text: Comfortable, clean professional. Good cars,very up to date,airconditioned.polite stuff. Roads are good,safe.
place: Private Transfer from Cancun Airport to Tulum

title: Good for family
text: Great breakfast,family friendly, good atmosphere, welcoming,food is good.We had a pleasant experience.

title: Good place to visit
text: Comfortable easy going, good food,friendly.Nice out door tables and lighting, good garden,food was fresh,tasty,stuff was pleasant.

title: Space is actually smaller than on the picture, but service is frendly.
text: Food presentation is not like on the picture, freshness is ok,if they have it like on the picture, they can be the best in NY.

title: Summer oysters are good,salads fresh,presentation sophisticated.
text: Oysters are good in the summer, salads fresh,presented sophisticated. Place is clean, staff is trained well.Family friendly. Bands playing.

title: Classic unique romantic
text: Clean. Romantic.Classic. Lot's of attention to details.Feeling of being inside of the classic movie.Stuff is very polite, paintings in the rooms all different and original. What is refreshing for a change.Landscaping is tidy and well thought out.
